WorkItem.Description:
When adding a new TypeScript file from Solution Explorer the editor window appears and then VS2013 crashes. Looks like something to do with WebEssentials, see attached Event Log entries.

Running VS2013 Pro Update 1, TS 1.0RC, WebEssentials 1.9 on Win 8.1 Pro.
WorkItem.Summary: VS 2013 crash when creating new .ts file

Comments.Message: Thanks for the report. Assuming this doesn't repro with Web Essentials uninstalled please file this against them here https://github.com/madskristensen/WebEssentials2013/issues since there's nothing we (TypeScript) can really do here.

I've filed this as a bug with the WebEssentials project here: 

https://github.com/madskristensen/WebEssentials2013/issues/776
Workaround -- Install V1.8.5 from here: http://vswebessentials.com/changelog
Thanks, I've installed VS2013 Update 2 CTP and latest nightly build of Web Essentials and the problem is gone. No need to bother revisiting perhaps.
